channel.title: [317]ERROR trying to add godwars npcs to my client but the npc is invisible
channel.description: im completely new to this, i download the ints of the godwars monsters, and i got .dat files also, i put the .dat files in models in the client and do add model and the .dat numbers but it says unable to find. and when i spawn the npc its invisible, can someone help me?

item.title: [317]ERROR trying to add godwars npcs to my client but the npc is invisible
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Bakpao, post:4, topic:333686”]You don’t have to “add model” if you add NPC’s so screw everyone that’s giving you bad information.

First you need the NPC ints.
Place them in class5.java
Then you’re going to need to download the NPC .dat files along with the animation ints. Animation ints go in class20.java

Simply extract the .dat files in models folder, compile your client and play.
Hope that helped.[/quote]

hes talking about npc models, not animation files, so they must be gzipped or preloaded for the npc to show up…

Read full topic
item.source: [317]ERROR trying to add godwars npcs to my client but the npc is invisible

item.title: [317]ERROR trying to add godwars npcs to my client but the npc is invisible
item.dc:creator: @Bakpao Bakpao
item.description:
@Bakpao wrote:

You don’t have to “add model” if you add NPC’s so screw everyone that’s giving you bad information.

First you need the NPC ints.
Place them in class5.java
Then you’re going to need to download the NPC .dat files along with the animation ints. Animation ints go in class20.java

Simply extract the .dat files in models folder, compile your client and play.
Hope that helped.

Read full topic
